rawConfiguration.text:
![Logo](https://i.imgur.com/tQqeUSp.png)

- - -
### Overview
`ProxySQL` is an open source high performance, high availability, database protocol aware proxy for MySQL.

### About this Dashboard

This dashboard is based on standard `ProxySQL` Prometheus metrics ingested using Prometheus [remote write](https://newrelic.com/instant-observability/prometheus-remote-write/7dbd7355-c380-4211-bd32-fed9a65351af).  Most widgets utilize an `instance` facet to identify `ProxySQL` instances in the cluster.

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT (average(proxysql_active_transactions) * cardinality(proxysql_active_transactions)) as 'Active Transactions' FROM Metric WHERE instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' and (app_kubernetes_io_name LIKE '%proxysql%' or app_newrelic_com_name LIKE '%proxysql%') FACET instance TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT ((latest(proxysql_client_connections_connected) / latest(proxysql_mysql_max_connections)) * 100) as 'Frontend Usage' FROM Metric WHERE instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' and (app_kubernetes_io_name LIKE '%proxysql%' or app_newrelic_com_name LIKE '%proxysql%') FACET instance TIMESERIES AUTO

widgets.title: Incoming Writes vs Entries Stored Overview

nrqlQueries.query: FROM Metric SELECT (average(proxysql_query_cache_count_set_total) * cardinality(proxysql_query_cache_count_set_total)) as 'Incoming Writes' WHERE instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' and (app_kubernetes_io_name LIKE '%proxysql%' or app_newrelic_com_name LIKE '%proxysql%') TIMESERIES AUTO

FROM Metric SELECT (average(proxysql_query_cache_entries_total) * cardinality(proxysql_query_cache_entries_total)) as 'Entries Stored' WHERE instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' and (app_kubernetes_io_name LIKE '%proxysql%' or app_newrelic_com_name LIKE '%proxysql%') TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT (average(proxysql_client_connections_connected) * cardinality(proxysql_client_connections_connected)) as 'Total Frontend Connections' FROM Metric WHERE instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' and (app_kubernetes_io_name LIKE '%proxysql%' or app_newrelic_com_name LIKE '%proxysql%') TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT (average(proxysql_connpool_conns) * cardinality(proxysql_connpool_conns)) as 'Total Backend Connections (in-use)' FROM Metric WHERE instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' and (app_kubernetes_io_name LIKE '%proxysql%' or app_newrelic_com_name LIKE '%proxysql%') and status = 'used' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT (average(proxysql_connpool_conns) * cardinality(proxysql_connpool_conns)) as 'Total Backend Connections (free)' FROM Metric WHERE instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' and (app_kubernetes_io_name LIKE '%proxysql%' or app_newrelic_com_name LIKE '%proxysql%') and status = 'free' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(proxysql_client_connections_non_idle) as 'In-Use' FROM Metric WHERE instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' and (app_kubernetes_io_name LIKE '%proxysql%' or app_newrelic_com_name LIKE '%proxysql%') TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT (latest(proxysql_client_connections_connected) - latest(proxysql_client_connections_non_idle)) as 'Idle' FROM Metric WHERE instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' and (app_kubernetes_io_name LIKE '%proxysql%' or app_newrelic_com_name LIKE '%proxysql%') TIMESERIES AUTO

FROM Metric SELECT percentage(sum(proxysql_query_cache_count_get_total), WHERE status = 'ok') or 0 as '' WHERE instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' and (app_kubernetes_io_name LIKE '%proxysql%' or app_newrelic_com_name LIKE '%proxysql%') Facet instance

FROM Metric SELECT (average(proxysql_slow_queries_total) * cardinality(proxysql_slow_queries_total)) as 'Slow Queries' WHERE instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' and (app_kubernetes_io_name LIKE '%proxysql%' or app_newrelic_com_name LIKE '%proxysql%') FACET instance TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(proxysql_client_connections_connected) FROM Metric WHERE instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' and (app_kubernetes_io_name LIKE '%proxysql%' or app_newrelic_com_name LIKE '%proxysql%') FACET instance TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT latest(proxysql_server_connections_connected) FROM Metric WHERE instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' and (app_kubernetes_io_name LIKE '%proxysql%' or app_newrelic_com_name LIKE '%proxysql%') FACET instance TIMESERIES AUTO

FROM Metric SELECT sum(proxysql_access_denied_wrong_password_total) WHERE instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' and (app_kubernetes_io_name LIKE '%proxysql%' or app_newrelic_com_name LIKE '%proxysql%') FACET instance TIMESERIES AUTO

FROM Metric SELECT sum(proxysql_access_denied_max_user_connections_total) WHERE instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' and (app_kubernetes_io_name LIKE '%proxysql%' or app_newrelic_com_name LIKE '%proxysql%') FACET instance TIMESERIES AUTO

FROM Metric SELECT sum(proxysql_access_denied_max_connections_total) WHERE instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' and (app_kubernetes_io_name LIKE '%proxysql%' or app_newrelic_com_name LIKE '%proxysql%') FACET instance TIMESERIES AUTO

FROM Metric SELECT sum(proxysql_max_connect_timeouts_total) WHERE instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' and (app_kubernetes_io_name LIKE '%proxysql%' or app_newrelic_com_name LIKE '%proxysql%') FACET instance TIMESERIES AUTO

FROM Metric SELECT sum(proxysql_backend_lagging_during_query_total) WHERE instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' and (app_kubernetes_io_name LIKE '%proxysql%' or app_newrelic_com_name LIKE '%proxysql%') FACET instance TIMESERIES AUTO

FROM Metric SELECT sum(proxysql_backend_offline_during_query_total) WHERE instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' and (app_kubernetes_io_name LIKE '%proxysql%' or app_newrelic_com_name LIKE '%proxysql%') FACET instance TIMESERIES AUTO
